text: Mpi Anauel Ngamissengue (born 3 February 1996) is a Congolese professional boxer. As an amateur, he competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's middleweight event, in which he was eliminated by Ilyas Abbadi in the round of 32. ==Professional boxing record== {|class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:95%" |- ! !Result !Record !Opponent !Type !Round, time !Date !Location !Notes |- |4 |Win |4–0 |align=left| Ismael Seck | |6 |28 Feb 2020 |align=left| | |- |3 |Win |3–0 |align=left| Davit Makaradze |TKO |4 (6) |25 Jan 2020 |align=left| | |- |2 |Win |2–0 |align=left| Kamel Benyattou | |1 (6) |28 Dec 2019 |align=left| | |- |1 |Win |1–0 | align=left| Sladjan Dragisic | |2 (4) |19 Oct 2019 |align=left| | |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Republic of the Congo male boxers Category:Olympic boxers of the Republic of the Congo Category:Boxers at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Middleweight boxers Category:Sportspeople from Brazzaville
title: Anauel Ngamissengue
